items.label: I'm Hidden because there is no 'data.coverageID'
You see this because <"showIf": {"name": "coverageID", "relativeData": true}> resolves to 'data.coverages.{index}.coverageID', which is considered 'Truthy'

items.name: coverageID
items.label: And here is how to evaluate it <"showIf": {"name": "", "relativeData": true, "equal": "Gold"}>
Finally, only Silver shows up because <"equal": {"name": "coverages.1.coverageID"}> evaluates to 'Silver'
